subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Speedskating
Short Track Skating
lead_paragraph: The short-track speedskater secured the silver medal in the 1,500 meters, tying Bonnie Blair for the most ever Winter Olympic medals won by an American, with six.
snippet: The short-track speedskater secured the silver medal in the 1,500 meters, tying Bonnie Blair for the most ever Winter Olympic medals won by an American, with six.
